name: part_007
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】あくあ色すーぱーみらくる☆どり〜む♪【#湊あくあ3Dライブ 】 [gf7RSwmp8dM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Kimi Iro Signal' (君色シグナル).
MC segment where Minato Aqua thanks her fans during the song performance.
Resumption and conclusion of the 'Kimi Iro Signal' performance.
Performance of the song 'Aimaimoko' (アイマイモコ).

subtitles.original: ふたり歩くいつもの帰り道
subtitles.english: The usual way home we walk together.

subtitles.original: 名前はない気持ちが芽生え始めてる
subtitles.english: A feeling without a name is starting to sprout.

subtitles.original: だけど踏み出すための勇気は
subtitles.english: But the courage to take a step forward...

subtitles.original: 少しだけまだ遠くにある
subtitles.english: ...is still a little bit out of reach.

subtitles.original: 何も持っていなかった私に
subtitles.english: To me, who had nothing...

subtitles.original: 君がくれた心の鍵は
subtitles.english: ...the key to my heart that you gave me...

subtitles.original: 胸の奥で眠ってた蕾に
subtitles.english: ...to the bud that was sleeping deep in my chest...

subtitles.original: 春の日差しを届けてくれる
subtitles.english: ...it brings the spring sunlight.

subtitles.original: 君をいつだっていつだって想ってるから
subtitles.english: Because I'm always, always thinking of you.

subtitles.original: きっといつの日かいつの日かちゃんとわかってほしい
subtitles.english: I hope that one day, one day, you'll truly understand.

subtitles.original: ふたりで描いた未来を
subtitles.english: The future we drew together...

subtitles.original: もっと近い距離で見つめられるように夢見てるから
subtitles.english: ...I'm dreaming so we can gaze at it from closer range.

subtitles.original: みんなのおかげで、こうやって夢だった3Dライブやることができました！
subtitles.english: Thanks to everyone, I was able to perform this 3D live, which was my dream!

subtitles.original: 本当にみんなありがとね！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much, everyone!

subtitles.original: これからも、みんなどうぞ湊あくあのことよろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: From now on as well, please continue to support Minato Aqua!

subtitles.original: ライブはまだまだ終わらないけど、よかったら最後まで見てくれると嬉しいです！
subtitles.english: The live isn't over yet, but I'd be happy if you could watch until the end!

subtitles.original: あの日触れた君のシグナル
subtitles.english: Your signal that I touched that day.

subtitles.original: 始まりの扉が開くよ
subtitles.english: The door to the beginning is opening.

subtitles.original: あのね、
subtitles.english: You know...

subtitles.original: 君はいつだっていつだって変わらないでね
subtitles.english: Please don't ever, ever change.

subtitles.original: 私に何回も何回もシグナル送ってほしい
subtitles.english: I want you to send me signals over and over again.

subtitles.original: 輝くあの虹のように
subtitles.english: Like that shining rainbow...

subtitles.original: 涙のあとも奇跡に変えるよ
subtitles.english: ...I'll turn even the traces of tears into a miracle.

subtitles.original: 君はいつだっていつだって変わらないから
subtitles.english: Because you never, ever change...

subtitles.original: 私が何回も何回もシグナル送ってあげる
subtitles.english: ...I'll send you signals over and over again.

subtitles.original: 夢見たあの背中目指して
subtitles.english: Aiming for that back I dreamed of...

subtitles.original: 挫けそうな時も頑張れそうだよ君がいるから
subtitles.english: ...even when I'm about to give up, I feel like I can do my best because you're here.

subtitles.original: すき
subtitles.english: I love you.

subtitles.original: 付かず離れずの毎日
subtitles.english: Every day, neither too close nor too far.

subtitles.original: 退屈なんてないけど
subtitles.english: There's no boredom, but...

subtitles.original: 胸の痛み苦しくて泣きたい時もある
subtitles.english: ...sometimes the pain in my chest is so hard I want to cry.

subtitles.original: 些細な出来事さえも
subtitles.english: Even the most trivial events...

subtitles.original: 特別だって思うよ
subtitles.english: ...I think they're special.

subtitles.original: ほらね今も君のこと考えちゃうの
subtitles.english: See, even now, I find myself thinking of you.

subtitles.original: 好きと嫌い交互に数えていく占い
subtitles.english: A fortune-telling counting "like" and "dislike" alternately.

subtitles.original: 2分の1の確率踏み出せないね
subtitles.english: A one-in-two chance, I just can't take that step.

subtitles.original: 君と大空見上げたら
subtitles.english: When I look up at the vast sky with you...

subtitles.original: この気持ちだって言えるかな
subtitles.english: ...I wonder if I can express these feelings.

subtitles.original: 一つ一つ言葉にしよう
subtitles.english: I'll put them into words, one by one.

subtitles.original: 笑って聞いてくれたなら
subtitles.english: If you listen with a smile...

subtitles.original: きっとああこの関係はアイマイモコっていうのかな
subtitles.english: ...then surely, I wonder if this relationship is what's called 'Aimaimoko'.

subtitles.original: つれづれでも I wish, I feel my sweet 大切にしなくちゃ
subtitles.english: Even in weariness, I wish, I feel my sweet, I have to cherish it.
